EmailTemplate.name: Contact Pivotal.Confirmation 2019
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for contacting Pivotal. We’ll get back to you as soon as possible. If you have a technical support question, you may find it easier to visit Pivotal Support <[[https://support.pivotal.io]]>.
While you wait, learn how good companies become great by becoming a digital disruptor and read best practices for building transformational software today…and tomorrow!
A few places to get started:
- Subscribe to our weekly newsletter <[[https://pivotal.io/newsletter-subscription]]>, featuring podcasts, blog posts, videos, events, and company news. - Learn about SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io]]>, the premier conference for developers & operators who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software. - Watch a one minute overview <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&v=f-H1aJJpm0U]]> on Pivotal, or check out our customer page <[[https://pivotal.io/customers]]> to learn how enterprises across industries are turning to Pivotal to transform the way they build and release products, drive decisions, and interact with customers. - Start a free trial <[[https://run.pivotal.io/]]> of Pivotal Web Services and get an app up and running on <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/introduction]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF). - Explore our resource center <[[https://pivotal.io/resources]]> for the latest Pivotal webinars, white papers, ebooks, and industry analyst reports.
We look forward to speaking with you soon, The Pivotal Team
